summary: Some various recolored textures for Hothtrooper44's Fur Collar and Immersive Armors mods. All colors now included in one plugin with optional enchantments.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]Description[/size][/b]

[size=3]As [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/16568284]Zoinho1[/url][size=3] commented on Hothtrooper44's mod thread, some color options sounded like a good idea; one that I hadn't considered for some reason. Either way, Hothtrooper44 gave me permission to upload these files so here's a collection of 6 new colors to pick from. [/size]


[size=4]Update 02-04-2016[/size]

[size=3]All colors are now included in the "Fur Collars" and "Exotic Fur Collars" files. Exotic Fur Collars adds enchanments and crafting, I didn't include crafting for base collection because I didn't want to overload the crafting log with 12 recipes. Both files have a container now that you can spawn using the "Help Fur Collar Chest" search and "Player.placeatme (Insert Chest ID)". [/size]


[size=4]Enchantments:[/size]
[size=3]
Regular: Frost resistance and Shout recovery improved by 10%
Frost: Frost and Fire resistance improved by 10%
Black: Sneaking improved by 10% and Magic Resistance improved by 5%
White: Restoration spells improved by 10% and Magicka fortified by 15
Blood: Weapon attack speed increased by 10%
Brown: Fire resistance improved by 15% and prices improved by 10%
Moss: Health fortified by 20 and Poison resistance improved by 10%[/size]


[size=4]Installation

[/size][size=3]Hothtrooper44's Fur Collar mod is required, just disable the .esp after installing; for compatibility with Immersive Armors, just extract the meshes and textures you want and replace the files in Immersive Armors. This mod uses standalone textures so your male Archmage robes won't be affected. 
[/size]

[size=4]Requests[/size]

[size=3]Will I do color requests? Possibly, though this took me about a minute to change the colors for each texture and is about the easiest retexturing ever. With a little setup and know-how you can easily retexture the base game's file to your liking. I may look into doing patterns though, so I'll keep people posted on that after I see how friendly the textures are with the meshes.[/size]


[size=4]Possible Additions [/size][size=3]- Open to suggestions, though I'd like to keep new collars creative.[/size]

[size=3]Sabercat Collar: +Movement speed, +Jump height
Troll Collar: +Moderate Regeneration[/size]


[size=4]Credits[/size]

[size=6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3656551]hothtrooper44[/url] [/size]
author: Gisla
